on reading compounds: 垂纓【スイエイ】hanging tail (of a traditional Japanese hat), drooping tail
kun reading compounds: 垂れる【たれる】to hang, to droop, to dangle, to sag, to lower, to pull down, to leave behind (at death), to give, to confer, to drip, to ooze, to trickle, to drop
垂らす【たらす】to dribble, to spill, to suspend, to hang down, to slouch, to dangle
垂れ【たれ】sauce (esp. soy or mirin-based dipping sauce), hanging, something hanging (flap, lappet, etc.), (kendo) loin guard, kanji radical enclosing the top-left corner of a character, -ass, -head
垂れ幕【たれまく】hanging banner, hanging screen, curtain
垂んとす【なりなんとす】to close in on (30 years of age, etc.), to approach, to get close to
垂んとする【なんなんとする】to close in on (30 years of age, etc.), to approach, to get close to
